data.current_description: Delete the Blog Tag object identified by the id in the path.
data.description_suggestion: Archives (soft deletes) the blog tag identified by the objectId in the path. The tag is marked as deleted but retained in the system for historical reference. Returns the archived tag object. Archived tags are no longer available for new blog post associations but existing associations are preserved.
data.reasoning: Summary says 'Delete' but operation is actually 'archive' (soft delete). Description doesn't clarify the distinction or explain side effects. Added clarification that this is archival (not permanent deletion), what happens to existing associations, and what is returned. This helps AI agents understand the actual operation semantics.

data.current_description: Explicitly set new languages for each Blog Tag in a multi-language group.

data.current_summary: Detach a Blog Tag from a multi-language group
data.current_description: Detach a Blog Tag from a multi-language group.
data.description_suggestion: Remove a Blog Tag from its multi-language group association. Accepts a Blog Tag identifier in the request body. After detachment, the tag becomes independent and is no longer synchronized with other tags in the group. Returns the detached Blog Tag object. The tag will no longer inherit language updates from the group.
data.reasoning: Current description is repetitive and lacks essential details about operation effects and return values. Added clarity on what detachment means (independence from group), synchronization behavior, and return value to help AI agents understand the consequences of this operation.
